name: DAEMMERLICHT
description:
You're playing as a small, orb like vessel that was pulled into this world by someone or something. As you arrive at this place, that was most likely build by the ones who send you there, you're trying to understand why you are there. But it will soon dawn on you that this isn't a place to stay, as you find out that you are not the first one to arrive. But will you be the last?

  • Explore a dark and ominous world.
  • Find three lights, attached to three decisions.
  • Collect remnants(lore) of the poor souls that came before you.
  • Fight the last defense, protecting the light

You will have the option of either playing in native resolution or turning on "low-res" mode for bigger, crunchier pixels.
